tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (X (NP (DT That) (JJ depressing) (NN moment)) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBP lose) (NP (DT a) (NN follower)))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [moment/NN det>That/DT amod>depressing/JJ dep>[lose/VBP advmod>when/WRB nsubj>you/PRP dobj>[follower/NN det>a/DT]]]
